Plus I have a vague idea of what the next thing will be. I think a big reason why this has come to me is because of the inspiration I've gained from you in the last year or so. Does hearing things like this make you feel good or interesting?

3.16.18  1:02 am   ‎i love nature and how there's this matter in our world and it spontaneously organized itself into life, and how being alive ourselves we also inherently love life too, and how nothing man has made has come close to the complexitiy of life, butalso how the existence of something as complex as life represents an interesting future for human technology that exceeds in domains dominatated by life, you know?

3.15.18  8:10 pm   3.14.18  7:11 pm Okay, I will try that. Thanks! One thing I've learned that is really important is that it's how the voice matches with the melody and words... like getting the most out of the style of your voice. Good example I can think of is donald fagen. I can't imagine him belting out freddie mercury tunes or something, but I think he's a great singer because his voice is perfect for his melodies/words. I guess I just need to find my 'character' in my voice?

3.15.18  8:03 pm   when i record something it shows up like half a second later in the mix. it's really annoying to have to fix it every time and it has discouraged me from recording,  has this ever happened to you?
